title: Escape from Tykonia
description: A lone space captain arrives in a new galaxy and finds himself on the mysterious planet of Tykonia. He inadvertently joins a failing rebellion using top secret files he obtained. With this new rebellion, he attempts to leave Tykonia, but finds the rebels & himself pursued by the controlling alien empire of the galaxy: the Trisconians. He is soon entrusted with a mystic Red Ring that contains a deep, ancient power that is unlike anything he, the rebellion, or the galaxy has ever seen before.Librarian's note: This is an alternate cover edition for ISBN 1490964053.
author: Trent Gillespie
